/3d-configurator/arm-chair.title: Arm Chair 3D Configurator | Yogesh Gupta — Customize Colors, Materials, Textures
/3d-configurator/arm-chair.description: Customize a premium 3D Arm Chair with real-time texture, material, and rotation controls. Built using React Three Fiber and WebGL, this interactive experience showcases photorealistic lighting and handcrafted GLTF models.
